pageContext.claim: “World Trade Organization, makes it almost impossible for us to do good business. We lose the cases. We don't have the judges. We have a minority of judges.”
pageContext.analysis: The United States has won about 90 percent of cases it brought to the WTO since 1995. Moreover, neither country involved in a WTO case can have a judge involved in the case. So there are no majorities for or against.
